term.title: enrichment factor

item.text: The factor by which the ratio of two substances in the feed must be multiplied to give their ratio after treatment. QA/QB = S(A,B).(QA'/Q B') and QA' are the final and initial amounts of species A and QB and QB' are the final and initial amounts of species B. Hence S(A,B) = EA/EB where E is the fraction extracted.
